Greetings members vpsB!

we are VenexCloud LTD, a new hosting company start-up that aims to provide highly reliable services at affordable rates. Our servers are located in IOFLOOD DC Phoenix, AZ and powered by ssds with 99.99% uptime guaranteed.

Features:

  • Pure SSD RAID10 VPS Servers
  • Zero setup fees
  • 99.9% guaranteed uptime
  • Fast and dependable premium network
  • 24x7x365 support
  • Fedora, centos, debian, freebsd, ubuntu and even your own iso [kvm plans]
